DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~r~Suspect: ~w~Splaaaa, bleugggghhhhh
~b~You: ~w~Hello, is everything alright?
~b~You: ~w~Hello! Can we just have a quick conversation please?
~r~Suspect: ~w~Neooooooooo, but I don't want to.
~b~You: ~w~I think it would be best if we could; do you have any details on you?
~r~Suspect: ~w~Hmmm...no thanksss...
~r~Suspect:~w~ BLALALALALA! TIME TO GOO BYEE OFFICER!
~r~Suspect:~w~ Hello, thank god you are here!
~b~You: ~w~ Hello, what's the matter?
~r~Suspect:~w~ I've got lost, I'm not from the area you see. I don't know how to get home.
~b~You:~w~ Oh dear, is there anyone who could pick you up?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Oh yes, I do! Let me text them now.
~b~You: ~w~ Perfect. If they can't come I will see if we can put together some alternative arrangements.
~b~You:~w~ What's going on?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Nothingg...just had a great partyyy.
~b~You:~w~ I see, and you are just wandering around?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yesss, I loveee being outside.
~b~You:~w~ Can I have your name please?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Okay..my name is Ben Dover.
~b~You:~w~ Quit the jokes, I want your real name.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Let me try to remember...I think it is {0}.
~b~You: ~w~Hi there, is everything okay?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yes, yes it is.
~b~You:~w~ I see, we just had reports of a disorientated invididual in the area.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Okay, and is that a crime?
~b~You:~w~ No, we just wanted to establish that you are okay.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm perfectly fine, but I'd appreciate if you left me alone.
~b~You:~w~ If you insist, have a good day.
